release: v2.4.0 - Sprint 19 preparation and documentation cleanup

## Documentation Cleanup

- Update ROADMAP.md with 5/5 star code quality rating

## Sprint 19 Plan Created
**Goal**: Production Launch & CI/CD Pipeline

Phase 1: Pre-production validation (load tests, security audit)
Phase 2: CI/CD pipeline setup (GitHub Actions)
Phase 3: Production deployment (Railway/Vercel)
Phase 4: Post-launch monitoring (Sentry, performance)

- Fix TypeScript: Add Player, Bet imports (botPlayerEnhanced)
